column4: I have a flashed radeon 9000 pro agp. Is there anyway to get ubuntu to reconize it?
Mac OSX does fine... but ubuntu won't use card
flashed cards, pc cards in mac, ppc cards, flashed pc video cards
how about searching for  just agp video ...
that's  great but i have no way to intsall ubunt :p
alternate installation cd ?  it's text based
the livecd won't reconize my card... and consequently i can't install it.. the livecd will give me a yaboot screen (on the monitor connected to card) but then all goes dead
alternate installation cd ?  it's text based
mat3243, teh live cd wil lwork fine
mat3243, but mat, if your correct in saying that it really corrupt your drive as in teh files aren't there.. then you have some problems.. but i may only have killed grub :p
if he installed on a seperate hdd, it shouldnT' have messed with the ubuntu hdd,  unless he installed on the wrong hdd
never can tell with those commercial installers...
and also ive done stupid things like selecting the wrong hdd before :p
we've all done it,  that's how we learn ,  we aren't smart, we are just realy stupid and we've made all the stupid mistake we could make,  so now we know not to make them
or if were really BRILLIANT we let others make stupid mistakes and tell us about it... and then learn from it
